content: winner of novita s autumn 2020 striped yarn sock competition these socks by stiina iloniemi are knitted by striping the novita majakkasaari and muumitalo yarns the vertical stripes are created using a slip_stitch pattern the jury adored the texture of the fabric which makes for a pair of simple and beautiful socks pattern in finnish 1 pattern in swedish 2 pattern in english 3 1 https //novita com/patterns/tyrsky--villasukat 2 https //novita com/sv/patterns/regnskur-sockorna 3 https //novita com/en/patterns/novita-majakkasaari-and-muumitalo-tyrsky-socks
